# ct-input

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute     | Description                                                                                 | Type      | Default      |
| -------------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------ |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`    | Disables the input field                                                                    | `boolean` | `false`      |
| `label` _(required)_ | `label`       | The label of the input field If no label is provided, the placeholder will be used as label | `string`  | `undefined`  |
| `placeholder`        | `placeholder` | The placeholder of the input field                                                          | `string`  | `this.label` |
| `type`               | `type`        | The type of the input field                                                                 | `string`  | `'text'`     |
| `value`              | `value`       | The value of the input field                                                                | `string`  | `undefined`  |
